Articles.Content:
First i have problem with log on to my ksp store account but when i finally made it i cannot download, why? I think about transferring to steam, maybe i this would be better.

PS. what is difference between 32 bit and 64 bit version, i have Intel Core 2 Quad Core Q8400 @2,66 Ghz and my windows 8.1 is 64 bit.

-snip-

What is difference between 32 bit and 64 bit version

-snip-

In 32-bit, the cpu can only process 32-bits of data per cycle, at its maximum. in 64-bit, the cpu can process 64-bits of data per cycle. As a general rule of thumb, 64-bit also allows for higher RAM amounts and usage for programs.

ThanksL:D

Can you tell my also why i cannot download new update from KSP store?

Too many people trying to fit into a small door. While the issues are better than before, I see there are still some being reported. The best I can say for now is to take a break and try again later.
